511170.name: Vanguard Princess Artwork and Soundtrack
511170.description:
This multimedia collection of art and music that is a must have for all Vanguard Princess fans! Listen to over 130 minutes of full-length music from all versions of Vanguard Princess. There's also a collection of hi-res artwork comprised of production work, and game stages. This is an ever expanding library for every new update or version of Vanguard Princess.
